about_the_game:
This DLC contains explicit sexual images! It is only suitable for adults aged 18 or above, and contains some content that some players may find offensive. The characters in this game are not true, good and beautiful. There are some plot descriptions of evil, cheating, multiple people, etc., as well as nudity, sex, workplace inappropriate, pornography, etc. Please consider purchasing! /h2]

After adding this DLC, adult videos/copywriting descriptions and illustrations will be added. The subject matter, content and form of this work are all virtual creations. Any similarity is purely coincidental. The fictional pornographic content in the content is for leisure and entertainment purposes only. Please do not imitate!
All characters in the game are over 18 years old. You must be over 18 years old to enter the game.

Game background:

My name is Zhang Wei. I just turned 30. Unexpectedly, I reached the lowest point in my life...
I used to be a key employee of a giant company in the industry, but the son of a shareholder parachuted in and became my direct leader! In anger, I resigned! But I was completely blocked by the industry...
I was addicted to my girlfriend's gentleness and spent a period of time in a drunken state. When I spent all my savings, she ran away without looking back...
I followed her to a new city, but was ignored by her. But is there a possibility that I can develop my old business in this city and make a comeback! ?
…………Another accident happened, and I was involved in a robbery case and became the only eyewitness
Hahahahahaha, life is really ups and downs!

Gameplay:

  • Strategy development system
  • Interesting and casual mini-games
  • Five distinctive heroines
  • A complete storyline

content_descriptors.notes:
This work contains nudity, nudity, sex, pornography and other adult content
The characters, place names, events, plots, etc. appearing in this work are all fictitious, and all themes, contents, and forms are fictitious creations.
Any resemblance is purely coincidental and the fictional fantasy content contained in the content is for entertainment purposes only.
All characters in this game are 18 years or older.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:

  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Gef750
